# pkgjose

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of pkgjose is to show Jose how easy is to do a package!!!

## Installation

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mendoncalf/pkgjose")
```
